snippet.title: Heretic's Fork: Probation - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Heretic's Fork: Probation, a free prologue version of Heretic's Fork, will be available on Steam today, June 2, 2023. Check out the latest trailer for Heretic's Fork to learn more about this upcoming deckbuilding bullet heaven and tower defense game. Heretic's Fork: Probation will feature an endless mode with one character, Intern Ruby, available. Intern Ruby will show the key mechanics of the game that future Hell managers will need to master.

Credit: The music in the trailer is written by Occams Laser.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
